example_patterns: sex-specific, sex-based, sex difference*, between men and women, sex-stratified, by sex, sex disparity
logic: OR across all patterns (any match = True)
also_triggers: Elevated to True if sex_interaction found

subgroup analysis sex/gender/men/women, sex subgroup, interaction sex/gender
also_triggers: Elevates sex_differences to True if not already

pregnant, pregnancy, gestational, lactating, breastfeeding, postpartum, prenatal
menopause*, postmenopause*, perimenopause*, hot flash, hormone replacement
hormonal, estrogen, progesterone, testosterone, endocrine, menstrual cycle
also_triggers: Parent flag - spawns sex_hormone_related and menstrual_cycle

exclude pregnant, must not be pregnant, negative pregnancy test
